events.title: the Battle of Culloden is fought, and the Jacobites lose

movie.title: Culloden
movie.plot: Culloden, Scottish Highlands, April 16th, 1746. It was one of the most mishandled and brutal battles ever fought in Great Britain. Its aftermath was tragic. The men responsible for such a disaster must be exposed. The men, women and children who suffered because of it must be remembered.

movie.title: The Finest Hours
movie.plot: The Coast Guard makes a daring rescue attempt off the coast of Cape Cod after a pair of oil tankers are destroyed during a blizzard in 1952.

movie.title: Just Mercy
movie.plot: The powerful true story of Harvard-educated lawyer Bryan Stevenson, who goes to Alabama to defend the disenfranchised and wrongly condemned â€” including Walter McMillian, a man sentenced to death despite evidence proving his innocence. Bryan fights tirelessly for Walter with the system stacked against them.

events.title: Kristen French, who Kaitlyn Ross is based on, is kidnapped

movie.title: Karla
movie.plot: Based on real events, Canada's most notorious serial killers, Paul Bernardo and wife Karla Homolka kidnap, sexually abuse, and murder three young girls.

events.title: Marie Colvin loses one of her eyes in an explosion

movie.title: A Private War
movie.plot: One of the most celebrated war correspondents of our time, Marie Colvin is an utterly fearless and rebellious spirit, driven to the frontlines of conflicts across the globe to give voice to the voiceless.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 1 win & 7 nominations.

events.title: Christian Longo is sentenced to death

movie.title: True Story
movie.plot: A drama centered around the relationship between journalist Michael Finkel and Christian Longo, an FBI Most Wanted List murderer who for years lived outside the U.S. under Finkel's name.

events.title: Molly Bloom is arrested for money laundering

movie.title: Molly's Game
movie.plot: Molly Bloom, a young skier and former Olympic hopeful becomes a successful entrepreneur (and a target of an FBI investigation) when she establishes a high-stakes, international poker game.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 50 nominations.
